description:
Internet trends convince people to do questionable things. And a lot of the time that involves eating things you normally wouldn't.

Remember the “Sleepy Chicken”? That is when you cook raw chicken in Nyquil. It not only sounds gross but is very dangerous because when you cook the cold medicine it creates some dangerous and toxic gas.

We also had the “Tide Pod Challenge”. Which was when a bunch of teenagers started eating Tide Pods. I don’t think that needs any more
title: South Korea is BEGGING people: Stop eating fried toothpicks for TikTok content

description:
Starbucks coffee is trash. It really is. That is why it is loaded with insane amounts of sugar to mask the taste of burnt toast with a sour aftertaste. And for someone whose entire business model is based on finding ways to disguise the revolting taste of your product by adding insane amounts of sugar, it is no surprise they would treat heroic employees the same way they treat their products. And that is like trash.

Two wannabe degenerate thugs tried to rob a Starbucks with fake guns. One of the robbers hit a barista in the head with his toy firearm. But it was not even a good fake because part of it shattered the moment he assaulted the worker. That is when one employee realized it was time to take matters into his own hands to save his coworkers and the customers.
title: Two Starbucks Employees Fought Robbers To Save Their Own Lives, So, Of Course, The Company Fired Them For it

description:
Progressives have it in their itty bitty minds that the “homeless crisis” has nearly everything to do with a lack of housing. But anyone with even a fraction of a brain knows it has nearly nothing to do with a lack of housing. So it is no surprise that we have found a bunch of degenerates living underground in furnished caves filled with 7,600 pounds of garbage in California, where the highest number of “unhoused” individuals are.

Modesto Police found constructed and fully furnished riverside caves where a bunch of degenerates had been living for quite some time. Some of the items found inside included bedding, food, drugs, and weapons.
title: Homeless Crisis So Bad In California, They're Found Living In Furnished Caves 20-Feet Below Ground

description:
When you don’t prosecute crime, you end up with evil people doing evil things. When you are soft on crime, you get more crime. This is common sense but Progressives like to pretend that criminals are just victims of the system who just need a hug and a warm blanket.

That is why it is not surprising that in one of the most progressive states, in one of the most progressive cities, a man stole a car with a two-year-old little boy in it. But clearly, a child’s life was not going to get in the way of this thugs conspiracy. So he drove for miles with the toddler in the car before he decided to pull over and drop him off to wander all alone on the street.
title: Video Captures Toddler Wandering The Street After Carjacking Suspects Steals Car With Him Inside, Then Just Leaves Him

description:
"Whoa Earthrider?"

Joe Biden traveled to Wisconsin on Thursday where his handlers let him attempt to speak in public. It is always a flip of a coin where it is a good idea or a bad idea to let him do so. Yesterday, the coin landed on derp.

Here's the latest example of classic Biden jibberish. I know some will call this his childhood stutter that none of us knew about until he was 77 years old. Other critics will say this is Biden's brain being 69% tapioca pudding and the words taking the wrong turn in Albuquerque on the way out of his mouth. You tell us.

If the danger is not immediate, but you suspect that elder abuse has occurred or is occurring, please tell someone. Relay your concerns to the local adult protective services,
title: Drunk or Dementia? Help us translate Joe Biden's latest old-man jibberish: "Whoa Earthrider"

description:
Disclaimer for the no-fun brigade with metal rods up their poopers: yes, I realize John Fetterman is still a Dem. If leftists can praise the Adam Kinzingers and Ana Navarros of the world unironically, we here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website can have fun with Fetterman for the sake of content. And the Pennsylvania Senator has taken a stand against one of the most pressing issues of our time. Chuck Schumer wanting to ban Zyn.

A tobacco product Schumer calls "a pouch packed with problems [with] high levels of nicotine" and that dudebros call "a pouch packed with awesomeness with high levels of nicotine." It's not my thing. But not unlike how tech blogger Tayor Lorenz
title: Dem-on-Dem: John Fetterman tells Chuck Schumer where to stick his ZYNsurrection, says he stands on "the side of freedom"

description:
For someone who is mainly known for getting emotional and not being able to calm down on X-Twitter, Alyssa Milano seems to be unaware of how the app works. You can argue it's toxic. However, if you are rich and famous and drop X begging for people to donate to your son's Little League team, you have no one to blame for the toxicity but yourself.

Not since she shared a meme questioning the odor emanating from her lady bits has Milano posted such an epic self-own.

Is this the freedom of speech you want, @elonmusk? How about copywrite infringement is that fine by you too?
title: Alyssa Milano, who is rich and (kinda) famous, takes to X to beg YOU to pay for her son's Little League team
